Articles.Content:
i've installed a few mods today worked fine untill i went above 70,000 meter.

the game crashed and i got a blue screen of dead. i tryed to strat the game again crashed but no screen of death.

error\_log

[http://pastebin.com/q0RUeqek](http://pastebin.com/q0RUeqek)

output\_log

[http://pastebin.com/nB3E5utE](http://pastebin.com/nB3E5utE)

in the output.log i found this file location

    (Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/StandalonePlayerGenerated/UnityEngineDebug.cpp Line: 56)[ModuleManager] Loading from Cache(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/StandalonePlayerGenerated/UnityEngineDebug.cpp Line: 56)Crash!!![ModuleManager] Parent null for /Physics(Filename: C:/buildslave/unity/build/artifacts/StandalonePlayerGenerated/UnityEngineDebug.cpp Line: 56)

but in my C; directory i dont have a buildslave map (it's not hidden i checked)

my mods:

    ompiling list of loaded mods...Mod DLLs found:  Assembly-CSharp v1.0.0.0  ModuleManager.2.6.5 v2.6.5.0  aaa_Toolbar v1.0.0.0 / v1.7.9.0  BDAnimationModules v0.0.0.0  DistantObject v1.5.5.20894  MechJeb2 v2.5.1.0  RasterPropMonitor v0.17.0.0 / v0.19.4  MechJebRPM v0.17.0.0 / v0.19.4  KerbalFlightData v1.0.0.0  KerbalFlightIndicators v1.0.0.0  RemoteTech v1.6.0.0 / v1.6.5  ScienceAlert v1.8.7.0  MiniAVC v1.0.3.0  KSPAPIExtensions v1.7.4.0  SmartParts v1.6.5.0  StageRecovery v1.5.6.0  MiniAVC v1.0.2.4  TacLifeSupport v0.11.1.0 / v0.11.1.20  KerbalAlarmClock v3.3.2.1Non-DLL mods added (:FOR[xxx]):Mods by directory (sub directories of GameData):  000_Toolbar  AdjustableLandingGear  BahaSP  JSI  Squad  ThunderAerospace  TriggerTech

Help me please

sry for my bad english
What's your RAM usage when the game crashes? How much RAM your system has?

my ram usuage is About 5 gb Total when the game crashe. 

i have a Total of 8 gb

> 
> my ram usuage is About 5 gb Total when the game crashe. 
> i have a Total of 8 gb

KSP is a 32-bit program and will crash at about 3.8 Gb ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
but i have a lot of other programs running as Well That use ram i think Only 3 of the 5 is from ksp
